channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游 09:46 Attention! Drone attack! Perhaps discharges of explosive items! Be in shelters!
item.description: 游 09:46 Attention! Drone attack! Perhaps discharges of explosive items! Be in shelters! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 09:44 The threat of shelling in Pokrovskaya territorial community.Creck on further reports.
item.description: 游릭 09:44 The threat of shelling in Pokrovskaya territorial community.Creck on further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游 09:40 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack lasts
item.description: 游 09:40 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack lasts This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Kharkiv_ This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
